description: Basic Encoding Rules (BER) encoder and decoder implementation for ASN.1, based on libIEC61850 C library. Provides functions for encoding and decoding BER-encoded data structures used in IEC 61850 protocol stack.

fields.name: ArcCount
fields.description: Number of arcs in the OID

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Asn1PrimitiveValue

NewAsn1PrimitiveValue.description: Creates a new Asn1PrimitiveValue with the specified max size

DecodeLength.signature: DecodeLength(buffer []byte, bufPos, maxBufPos int) (newPos int, length int, err error)
DecodeLength.description: Decodes a BER length field from the buffer. Returns the new buffer position, decoded length, or an error

DecodeString.signature: DecodeString(buffer []byte, strlen, bufPos, maxBufPos int) (string, error)
DecodeString.description: Decodes a BER string from the buffer

DecodeUint32.description: Decodes a BER unsigned 32-bit integer from the buffer

DecodeInt32.description: Decodes a BER signed 32-bit integer from the buffer

DecodeFloat.description: Decodes a BER float (32-bit) from the buffer

DecodeDouble.description: Decodes a BER double (64-bit) from the buffer

DecodeBoolean.description: Decodes a BER boolean from the buffer

DecodeOID.description: Decodes a BER Object Identifier from the buffer

EncodeLength.signature: EncodeLength(length uint32, buffer []byte, bufPos int) int
EncodeLength.description: Encodes a length value in BER format. Returns the new buffer position

EncodeTL.signature: EncodeTL(tag byte, length uint32, buffer []byte, bufPos int) int
EncodeTL.description: Encodes a Tag and Length in BER format. Returns the new buffer position

EncodeBoolean.signature: EncodeBoolean(tag byte, value bool, buffer []byte, bufPos int) int
EncodeBoolean.description: Encodes a boolean value with tag in BER format. Returns the new buffer position

EncodeStringWithTag.signature: EncodeStringWithTag(tag byte, str string, buffer []byte, bufPos int) int
EncodeStringWithTag.description: Encodes a string with tag in BER format. Returns the new buffer position

EncodeOctetString.signature: EncodeOctetString(tag byte, octetString []byte, buffer []byte, bufPos int) int
EncodeOctetString.description: Encodes an octet string with tag in BER format. Returns the new buffer position

EncodeAsn1PrimitiveValue.signature: EncodeAsn1PrimitiveValue(tag byte, value *Asn1PrimitiveValue, buffer []byte, bufPos int) int
EncodeAsn1PrimitiveValue.description: Encodes an Asn1PrimitiveValue with tag in BER format. Returns the new buffer position

EncodeBitString.signature: EncodeBitString(tag byte, bitStringSize int, bitString []byte, buffer []byte, bufPos int) int
EncodeBitString.description: Encodes a bit string with tag in BER format. Returns the new buffer position

EncodeUInt32.signature: EncodeUInt32(value uint32, buffer []byte, bufPos int) int
EncodeUInt32.description: Encodes an unsigned 32-bit integer in BER format. Returns the new buffer position

EncodeInt32.signature: EncodeInt32(value int32, buffer []byte, bufPos int) int
EncodeInt32.description: Encodes a signed 32-bit integer in BER format. Returns the new buffer position

EncodeUInt32WithTL.signature: EncodeUInt32WithTL(tag byte, value uint32, buffer []byte, bufPos int) int
EncodeUInt32WithTL.description: Encodes an unsigned 32-bit integer with tag and length in BER format. Returns the new buffer position

EncodeFloat.signature: EncodeFloat(floatValue []byte, formatWidth, exponentWidth byte, buffer []byte, bufPos int) int
EncodeFloat.description: Encodes a float value in BER format. Returns the new buffer position

RevertByteOrder.description: Reverses the byte order of the given slice

CompressInteger.description: Removes leading zero bytes or leading 0xFF bytes from an integer. Returns the new size

UInt32DetermineEncodedSize.description: Determines the encoded size of an unsigned 32-bit integer

Int32DetermineEncodedSize.description: Determines the encoded size of a signed 32-bit integer

DetermineLengthSize.description: Determines the size needed to encode a length value

DetermineEncodedStringSize.description: Determines the encoded size of a string

DetermineEncodedBitStringSize.description: Determines the encoded size of a bit string

EncodeOIDToBuffer.signature: EncodeOIDToBuffer(oidString string, buffer []byte, maxBufLen int) (int, error)
EncodeOIDToBuffer.description: Encodes an OID string to a buffer. Returns the number of bytes encoded or an error

maxDepth.description: Maximum recursion depth for decoding indefinite length
